body_html:
Hm, that is indeed weird. Not sure why CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES isn't helping you.

Can you try the following in the meantime?

config=tf.ConfigProto(device_count={"GPU": 0, "CPU": 1})
tf.Session(config=config)

body:
Hm, that is indeed weird.  Not sure why CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES isn't helping you.

Can you try the following in the meantime?

```
config=tf.ConfigProto(device_count={"GPU": 0, "CPU": 1})
tf.Session(config=config) 
```
